content kama oriented polystyrene productsagriculture packagingbakerycompostablecontainerscateringdrinkwaretabletoptrays & padswrapskamareynolon filmall products overview pactiv and kama came together in 2010 when pactiv was acquired by the rank group limited since the acquisition kama has continued to grow staying true to our unwavering commitment to our core principles of doing the right thing the right way our principles guide both our daily activities and our long-term strategy pactiv is the world’s largest ops producer with plants located throughout the country the majority of kama ops production comes out of the manteno illinois facility this facility is dedicated to making thermoforming grade polystyrene sheet since this is our core business everything we do from capital infusions process improvements and product line expansions supports this product line with our other locations in beech island south carolina temple texas and canandaigua new york kama has redundancy capacity to that allows us to offer the most competitive lead times in the industry best-in-class oriented polystyrene kama delivers purity processability and economic advantages that outperform our competition you will find more gauges grades and custom engineered specialty blends than ever before we even have standard colors including a series of translucent colors our leading anti-fog technology and real time gauge measurement system allows us to offer a best in class consistent product that our customers have come to expect with our flexible manufacturing and superior customer service we are able to deliver product quickly to our customers products fda approved and kosher certified oriented polystyrene • antifog • silicone coated o two side o non coated • corona treated • freezer grades o includes flash frozen applications • impact modification grades • standard colors o includes translucent grades • high clarity hi impact polystyrene • hi gloss co-extruded • prime • pactiv evergreen we strive to operate with respect for the environment and we are committed to sustainability across our product portfolio our manufacturing and supply chain and our communities in 2020 we advanced our commitments with new sustainability vision and mission statements along with a trio of pillars that outline our initiatives in addition we announced a bold new product goal: by 2030 100% of our products will be made with recycled recyclable or renewable materials this new goal supports our internal commitments and aligns well with our customers’ needs our sustainability strategy our sustainability vision lead and inspire sustainability stewardship our sustainability mission provide innovative paper and products that deliver safe fresh convenient food and beverages while valuing our planet people and communities our sustainability pillars protect our planets resources reduce emissions and energy use protect the sustainability of our forests minimize water use decrease waste going to landfill deliver sustainable products essential to customers implement our reduce reuse recycle renew four rs approach to our materials and products collaborate across the value chain to drive the four rs design innovative materials and products value our people and communities champion a culture of safety at work and at home attract empower and retain the best team embrace diversity and inclusion support the communities in which we work and live resources 2019-2020 sustainability report: click here to read our 2019-2020 sustainability report printer-friendly version can be found here pactiv evergreen through the esg lens: click here to download an overview of our environmental social and governance initiatives questions please direct questions to privacy virtual packaging assistantaboutcontact usethicscontact quality deptpatentscareerssearch for jobs pactiv>sustainability>planet sharegoogle+ facebook twitter linkedin protect our planets resources at pactiv evergreen we value our planet’s resources and are committed to using them wisely we are working to lessen the environmental footprint of our operations by reducing ghg emissions and energy use minimizing water use and decreasing waste we are also working to protect the sustainability of our forests and trees — a key input to our paper-based products and we are working to optimize our use of other raw materials through innovations in materials and product designs to maximize the sustainability of our products throughout their life cycles reducing our environmental impact is the right thing to do for our communities and the planet and it makes good business sense by reducing costs and risks and improving operational efficiency our comprehensive environmental management system helps us proactively address regulatory demands track performance ensure accountability and minimize the environmental impact of our operations to drive performance improvements we set internal environmental goals for each location key environmental performance metrics are reported regularly across the organization including to senior leaders we also consider environmental impacts as part of our capital project review process and require environmental training for relevant employees we’re proud to share some of our initiatives in this field below for more details read our 2019-2020 sustainability report reducing ghg emissions and energy use we recognize that climate change poses a serious threat to our planet we are committed to doing our part to help address it by working to reduce the ghg footprint of our operations and by protecting forests which provide an immense carbon capture and storage system when sustainably managed at pactiv evergreen we are committed to decreasing our greenhouse gas emissions ghg and energy use since 2015 about half of our annual energy consumption has come from renewable sources including biomass hydropower wind and solar this commitment is not new for example 10 years ago evergreen supported the development of western north carolina’s largest solar power array on a closed evergreen landfill property in haywood county the solar project which was developed with fls energy and progress energy generates approximately 730000 kwh of clean renewable electricity every year for the public utility in mexico we added a new cogeneration system at our zapopan plant in 2019 the system generates up to 93 megawatts of electricity and 910 tons of chilled water providing 90% of the plant’s energy and chilled water needs protecting the sustainability of our forests our success as a company depends on a sustainable supply of wood fiber after all over half of the materials by weight that go into our products use wood fiber as a key input but that is only part of the reason we support the sustainability of our forests forests provide social and economic value to the communities in which we live and work they offer sources of income for landowners and jobs for local residents spaces for recreation and habitats for many species they also help to mitigate the effects of climate change by providing long-term capture and sequestration of carbon dioxide the primary greenhouse gas to protect these forest values we’re committed to promoting responsible forest management practices and helping landowners obtain the resources they need to implement them to learn more about responsible forestry click here minimizing water use we primarily use water for process operations cooling and cleaning the majority of our water use occurs at our two paper mills most of our water use is “non-consumptive use” which means the water is treated and returned back to the environment after being used in our operations we have systems in place to measure and manage water use although the complexity of our water management systems varies depending on the facility decreasing waste going to landfill reducing waste in our operations is an ongoing company-wide pursuit we reuse the significant majority of plastic and paper scrap back in manufacturing our own products and implement programs to reduce scrap in production as much as possible the plastic or paper scrap that cannot be reused in the manufacturing process is taken by our recycling providers questions please direct questions to sustainability home - planet twitter linkedin pactiv evergreen canada welcome to pactiv evergreen canada concerned about the canadian single-use plastic ban we have good news for you at pactiv evergreen we manufacture products in more than fourteen materials types and are happy to share that many of these great products can be used in canada today and will be usable in the future based on the final publication of the canada gazette part 2 volume 156 number 13: single-use plastics prohibition regulations on 06-22-2022 more details and guidance from the government of canada may also be found here to help support your needs we’ve gathered together a number of resources to help you with packaging solutions that are both great for your business and that meet with current and upcoming regulations canada marketing materials this page has brochures in both english and french canadian for products that are acceptable for use now and after the restrictions on the sale of our affected products go into effect in december 2023 if you are using these products now you won’t have to switch to something else the virtual packaging assistant want to see if your area is currently under a packaging restriction download our app and enter your location to be presented with a list of packaging that is currently permitted in your area please note that our team updates this tool with new regulations on the date regulations go into effect this tool only filters for regulations that are currently in place not those that will be in implemented in the future for example legislation that has been passed but not yet in effect will not be reflected in the filtered results coming soon new products compliant with canadian regulations we are committed to adding the products you need for your operation and to meet these needs we’ll be adding exciting new products like our popular mealmaster half and full rib containers and chicken barns and roasters in a new white base with clear lid offering have additional questions contact your pactiv evergreen sales representative the information on this site is made available for the convenience of pactiv evergreen’s customers based on pactiv evergreen’s knowledge of its products and publicly available information that may become dated; the information provided should not be considered legal advice use of this information does not create an attorney-client relationship between the reader or user and any individual employed by pactiv evergreen pactiv evergreen urges its customers to consult their own legal advisors to obtain advice with respect to the requirements of any particular regulation or regulations in regard to the products they order only a customer’s individual attorney can provide assurances that the information contained herein regarding pactiv evergreen products is applicable or appropriate to the customer’s particular situation and planned use of pactiv evergreen products each pactiv evergreen customer is ultimately responsible for the compliance of their use of pactiv evergreen products with the laws and regulations of the locations where the customer uses the products pactiv evergreen disclaims any liability with respect to actions taken or not taken based on the contents of this website and no warranties or representations are made that the content is error-free for more detailed information about a specific product and to discuss your virtual packaging assistantaboutcontact usethicscontact quality deptpatentscareerssearch for jobs pactiv>privacy policy sharegoogle+ facebook twitter linkedin privacy policy welcome to wwwpactivcom the website operated by pactiv llc a delaware llc located at 1900 west field court lake forest il 60045 pactiv pactiv and its affiliates and subsidiaries collectively we our or us this privacy policy this “policy” describes how we may collect and use personally identifiable information pii and other information you may provide us through the website how does the website work the website offers visitors to the website you or your the opportunity to browse and use certain features of the website by using the website you consent to the collection and use of information by pactiv as described in this policy pactiv reserves the right to change how we handle the information we collect through the website at any time we will update this policy to reflect any changes in our information collection and handling practices and will indicate changes to this policy have been made by listing a new date under the heading “last revised” at the top of this policy any changes to the policy will take effect immediately once posted to the website what type of pii does pactiv collect from you and how do we use it visitors to the website are not required to provide us with any pii in order to view or browse the information contained in the website however we do require you to provide us with certain information in order to submit questions to us electronically or participate in promotions that may be offered from time to time in order to apply for a position with us through the website you will need to submit your resume or other materials to us you may be required to provide pii to us in order make use of certain features of the website we primarily use the information you provide us in order to perform the specific task or fulfill the identified purpose for which the information is provided for example we need your contact information to respond to an inquiry sent to us through the website’s “contact us” feature and we will need your application information and resume for any job or career related inquiries we may use any information you provide to us for our internal business purposes such as for data analysis for audits to improve or enhance the website to review usage patterns and to improve our services we may also share the information you provide us including pii with third party service providers who assist us in performing related tasks or fulfill the identified purposes of the website features we may also release your pii to third parties if we believe such release is necessary: i to comply with the law eg a legal process or a statutory authorization ii to enforce our user agreements iii to protect our rights or property iv as part of a corporate reorganization consolidation merger or sale of substantially all of the assets of pactiv or an affected operating unit or v because of a potential danger to any person we will not notify you if we share your information with such third parties under any of these or similar circumstances although pactiv seeks to require that all companies with which it does business protect all information provided to them by pactiv including personal information of visitors to the website pactiv cannot be responsible for third parties’ violations of this policy or of any other rights of visitors to this site what other information does pactiv collect the website may automatically collect certain data concerning access and activities of website visitors this data commonly referred to as “clickstream” data is used to facilitate website operation management and planning and may include the ip address of your computer the date and time of online requests the type of browser and operating system used by your computer the time required to download information you requested and any error codes generated while your browser is in contact with the website we also may collect anonymous and aggregate information from you about your preferences in navigating the website by using cookies action tags and other methods cookies are small text files that the website places on your computer’s hard drive that then identifies your computer we may use cookies to among other things monitor website usage customize website features identify your computer’s operating system and browser and complete transactions an action tag is a small graphic image on a webpage that is designed to allow the website owner or a third party to monitor who is visiting a website by collecting the ip address of the computer to which the tag is sent the url of the webpage that the tag comes from and the time that such webpage was viewed tags may be associated with cookie information if you do not want us to track such information about you you can set your browser to warn you before accepting cookies and refuse cookies when your browser alerts you to their presence you can also adjust the settings in your browser to refuse all cookies however certain features of the website might not work as intended if cookies are refused how is the pii collected through the website secured while we take reasonable efforts to protect pii provided to us no network or system is entirely secure pactiv cannot and does not guarantee that pii provided to us will not be lost disclosed or accessed by accidental circumstances or by the unauthorized acts of others does pactiv provide links to other websites the website may provide links to other websites or resources of possible interest to you these linked sites are not under the control of pactiv and we are not responsible for privacy practices or contents of such third party websites the inclusion of a link on this website does not imply any endorsement of the third party site or the owner of the site but is provided as a convenience to you if you provide pii to such third parties through their sites your pii shall be subject to the policies and procedures of such websites and not this policy what are our policies regarding children we provide a variety of content on our website and some of it may be appealing to children however we do not knowingly collect any pii from anyone under thirteen 13 years of age we recommend that all parents and guardians monitor their children’s online activities and learn about and use tools to provide assurance that their children enjoy the internet in a manner that is safe and enjoyable do we have a mechanism to address complaints about the handling of information that we collect if you have questions or concerns about any of our information collection or handling practices please contact us by email at or write to us at: pactiv llc 1900 west field court lake forest il 60045 attn: communications privacy policy terms of use terms of sale
